snippet.title: Frank Hawk: Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Frank Hawk is an endless runner skateboarding game where you progress through various levels made by the kids in Frank Lady World. Chozu's friends challenge him to skateboard obstacle courses, where he must race to the taco at the end of each level. Each level progressively becomes more difficult with more challenges, until he can reach the end.

This was a short fun little project I made for my brother's birthday this year! I've been learning Unity and C# since the end of last year, so this is the first full Unity game that I made in my free time and not for work.

As a side note, I definitely have a hard time beating the last level so this is my way of showing you what the Game Over screen looks like! 🤣

---------------------------

💾 Download and play the game here: https://michellerakar.itch.io/frank-hawk

---------------------------

⏰ Time Stamps:
0:00 - Title Screen
0:02 - Frank Lady Dialogue
0:11 - Stage 1
0:29 - Grenna Dialogue
0:37 - Grenna's Stage
1:38 - Ralphie Dialogue
1:55 - Ralphie's Stage
2:43 - Scott Dialogue
2:50 - Scott's Stage
5:40 - End Credits
